website_summaries.verdict: The 240Hz refresh rate and 1-millisecond response time is hard to beat, making this 25" monitor a good model for pro gamers.
pros: One of the fastest monitors available
Monitor's colours and contrast look great
Includes RGB lighting on back of monitor for a flashy look
cons: A few customers monitors had dead pixels
1080p resolution is lower than many competitors

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality and very, very smooth graphics!
customer_reviews.text: We got 4 of these for Christmas this year. One for myself, my wife, and 2 boys to use on our gaming rigs. All 4 are running our games as smooth as butter! I was very impressed at the difference in the smooth picture, compared to our old monitors, especially in First Person Shooter's. The packaging is well designed to protect these monitors for their journey to your house. The picture quality is very good, especially for a TN panel. Our games look better and no doubt run much smoother. 4 out of 4 have great picture quality and appear to be defect free.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Beck

customer_reviews.title: Competitive gaming
customer_reviews.text: honestly this monitor is pretty damn good. if you can get the frames for it you'll notice a difference in how even more smooth gameplay is when you consistently get more then 144 frames. such as 200 or so. i play competitive rainbow six siege and i can say this helps compete at a higher level. first day playing, no dead pixels, or shitty color noticed. im pretty happy with this monitor overall and i recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: david ginsberg

customer_reviews.title: Not for the casual gamer...its for the pros
customer_reviews.text: The 240 refresh rate is mind blowing. This is by far the best monitor I've ever bought. Its more adjustable than the rest. It has a love/love relationship with my 1080ti (MSI build) and brought my gaming to a new level. Great product for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: This is attached to an Alienware Aurora R8 with the GeForce 2080 graphics card. When you set it up invoke G-SYNC and use the NVIDIA settings for color (on NVIDIA control panel). Set then colors to whatever you find please. For any kind of text (wherever I can) I like the black background with white lettering. I can't see out of one eye and this arrangement is quite helpful, especially if you enlarge the text a bit. Set the monitor to the high resolution and I found the 120hz setting is great for everything except the most demanding games.
customer_reviews.author: A. Haydu

customer_reviews.title: packaging was a bit dented up otherwise the monitor is in perfect condition! I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased mine as "Used - Very Good" from Amazon warehouse, packaging was a bit dented up otherwise the monitor is in perfect condition! I love this thing. I came from an IPS display and was worried about moving to a TN but the image and colors are very sharp. To my surprise the viewing angle is exceptional as well, for a TN panel of course. I'd say it's as good as it would get for TN. The speed on this little monster is the main selling point and it surely delivers. I doubt I can go back to anything below 144hz again. The RGB LED's are just another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jaltorossian

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor a couple months ago and after a couple months of gaming im writing my review. This monitor is probably the best monitor i've ever used. The 240hz is so smooth in games and you even notice the difference from 240 from 144 when moving my mouse on my desktop. I have a second monitor which is 144hz and there is a clear difference. In games like Overwatch, Paladins, Minecraft, CS:GO and more there is a clear difference. If you have the money and big into gaming, this is an amazing monitor.
customer_reviews.author: mathew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hands down the best picture quality gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Hands down the best gaming monitor but just one thing. The response time. Yeah it might say 1ms but that's not true. I have a friend that owns a monitor that feels way faster and snappier but this one is super delayed and let's not talk about the ghosting. MAYJOR ghosting but other than that picture quality is just amazing for a Panel like this. Highly recommend light/medium gaming, other than that buy a better monitor if your looking into doing scrims etc.
customer_reviews.author: David Bejerano

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture, Most of the Time
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 Alienware montiors for my gaming setup this one and the 34” 4K curved. Both are beautiful but this one is already having some issues. Randomly there is a strip of dead pixels that will go from N to S down the monitor. It’s very frustrating mid-game but it usually fixes itself if I turn the screen on and off. I give them the benefit of the doubt though that this was just a bad monitor because my 34” is a delight to use. They do run very warm though, so if your office is already warm consider some additional room cooling to help keep your PC temps low in high loads.
customer_reviews.author: 4TheLoveOfKink

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big believer in hz over resolution. Gsync works well and the picture looks great for a tn. I use this over my 1440p 144hz gsync monitor. I'd minus 1/2 a star if I could because of the stand, but I've learned to live with it. A lot of people say they can't see the difference between 144 and 240 hz, but I can and it's been a tremendous change, so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming monitor for 240 Hz hands down
customer_reviews.text: The best monitor you can single-handedly purchase for a hard-core gamers only problem I had with this is that it is so beautiful and intense that long hours would give me headaches but that’s just me
customer_reviews.author: Mervan R.

customer_reviews.title: Visuals are so beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Picture is amazing best first monitor. Colors are so vivid. Never thought I’d ever experience something as far as visual quality and different colors like this. Made one mistake and my desktop camera was lately mounted on top and scratched the monitor but a tiny piece. Only bad part I guess would be that it scratches easy so be careful. Overall worth the money even though it’s pricey. If this monitor gets damaged I’ll buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Max D.

customer_reviews.title: came with 9 dead pixels but i can live with that
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sexy monitor for the price, came with couple of dead pixels but they are scattered not grouped, so not that noticeable, but the 240hz G-Sync is insanely good. if you're playing on 60hz monitor this is like day and night. must own if you're a competitive gamer like me.
customer_reviews.author: Lashello

customer_reviews.title: 240hz gaming is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I’ve never gamed at 240hz before and when I first used this monitor I could notice a difference but when I used my laptop I really noticed how big a difference it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sabir

customer_reviews.title: Black Line Issues
customer_reviews.text: This monitor looks fantastic until you get glitches. For some reason there are occasional black lines that condense and spread across the screen occasionally, especially during slightly intense gameplay moments. It's extremely frustrating. Other than that the refresh rate is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Larry the Lobster

customer_reviews.title: Great For Gaming! G-Sync works great! But make sure you have the correct connector cable...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is excellent for gaming. The 240Hz refresh rate is the best I've experienced. NOTE: if you have a gaming laptop like me (Alienware 17 R4) make sure to buy a Display port to Mini Display port to utilize the g-sync feature. After all, if you're not buying this laptop for the g-sync, there are a many other cheaper 1080p monitors on the market with comparable screen quality.
customer_reviews.author: James Phillip Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Not Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. It’s the perfect size. The specs are crazy. 240hz and 1ms response time. The build quality is great too. It’s very sturdy and is made with high quality materials. This honestly might be the best 1080p Gsync gaming monitor on the market right now.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Johnson-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy a new monitor stand
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that is super disappointing about this monitor is the stand. You can see in the first picture that the legs are extremely intrusive, and extend out on top of your mousepad/keyboard. It was really constricting my ability to aim and move the mouse properly. Luckily it has a vega100 mount which is very compatible. I’d recommend purchasing a different stand if you buy this monitor, like I did. (See second pic). Now I have proper amount of room with the mouse. Besides that detail everything else is incredible. Image quality, color, performance. You definitely get what you pay for with this 240hz.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: You decide
customer_reviews.text: You probably already know what you getting into lets be honest, yes its awesome, yes it does make a difference the question is does it matter and it the price worth it
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Immediate return
customer_reviews.text: The non-glare coating, or matte finish on this monitor is so thick, everything always looks fuzzy. Also, "whites" on this monitor have a strong yellow tint and you're not able to adjust it out. For a gaming monitor, where precision and crisp, clean lines matter...this monitor is useless. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels, can't even get a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this initially, came with a dead pixel. I was instructed to return for a replacement. Replacement ended up having a dead pixel as well. Tried contacting support for a resolution but they could not send me a new replacement for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than what your buying it for!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the screen doesn't have the borders on it giving you a true size of the screen your buying. other companies add the borders into the actual size giving you a smaller size screen you paid for. the settings in the monitor is pushed for fps and if you have a graphics card that's pushing your monitor around get this monitor it will push back lol....
customer_reviews.author: Victor Teo

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. No internal speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. I don’t nearly use it to its full potential. I just wanted something that could handle my pc if I ever need it to. Only con is there are no speakers on this monitor. You have to add your own speaker setup.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor cautious for dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, and all around gaming monitor. However, the first one I ordered had a DEAD not STUCK pixel that was really only noticeable on black screens. Ordered a replacement and the replacement had a dead pixel. It's in an area I dont notice it much at all so just dealing with it, but if you're super OCD be cautious and check your screens for error.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Howard

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I game in 1440p but bought this to get higher fps in games at 1080p. Works great for esport games. My 1440p set up goes to 145 fps so any game I max out on that I play on this monitor instead. If you have the free money laying around and can afford to push the frames it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jesus velez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Use this monitor for gaming and it’s better than expected. From picture quality to durability this monitor is top quality. Add in the RGB lighting on the back and you have the full package! The stand is made of metal and is very sturdy, the setup process is very easy even for beginners! In my opinion this is the best 1080p monitor for gaming on the market right now! Don’t hesitate to buy, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Winston

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing monitor. I was running a 60hz monitor with ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing monitor. I was running a 60hz monitor with a gtx 970 and i7 4770k and noticed an immediate difference once switching to the Alienware. Just wish gsync wasn't so expensive but can't complain about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a FullHD monitor from HP directly next to this one and boy... it doesn't even compare. Same resolution, but the color quality on this is unreal. Runs several games on steady 400 fps when I drop down some resolution settings.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic DeCooman

customer_reviews.title: it's good!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product no complaints. use a displayport cable and you will have 240 once you enable it in the properties, can confirm only thing im dissatisfied with is the box it came with; absolutely horrible condition luckily nothing was wrong with the monitor itself. Had it arrived with a better condition box, and was properly protected it would be 5 stars till then 4 from me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Best of the best for a 25 inch monitor. Used it for gaming
customer_reviews.author: mOSES

customer_reviews.title: Best 240hz Nuff said
customer_reviews.text: Sniped it on sale better than the other options at the same price point imo. I support the claim by saying I'm not a pro gamer sorry benQ and Asus is hit or miss. The USB hub option is a huge deal for me and the product quality is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Forbes,William

customer_reviews.title: great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this monitor is great ,was really impressed with the stand it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Don Kruse

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: best monitor on the market right now. Easy to assemble, AMAZING quality, packaging is very good. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: This 240hz monitor has some dull color problems, but all in all is exactly what it says it is. A 240hz monitor. It works great! It also has a backlit color option, you choose the colors on the back of your monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing gaming monitor, which makes me a better player in overwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Rekio7

customer_reviews.title: Line down middle
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s a really good monitor, got it for the refresh rate and the aesthetics of it. Packaging was top notch, speaking in a sense that it’ll be unharmed if it got dropped like 5 ft. It probably needs a new firmware update or maybe I need to get the drivers for it? It’s odd that a monitor requires drivers. But the only problem I had would be this overlap In the screen that runs down the middle. It’ll happen sometimes when the monitor goes to sleep or I reset my pc. Running it on my Oracle RTX with a 2080. It’s super fast and I don’t regret buying.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Yet to find one that combines a beautiful product with incredible performance. It’s expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Abuhl

customer_reviews.title: Fast refresh rate
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with a gtx 2060 super and it runs great. If you want 240fps I’d recommend a more powerful graphics card to push those frames out, but for standard rpg games ittl run great on medium settings (with a 2060s). Colors will need some tuning out of the box to get them looking just right. Comes with a displayport cable of ok quality. Great monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: 5 Dead pixels, white spot, LIGHT BLEED
customer_reviews.text: Monitor came new with 5 dead pixels and a random white spot that doesn’t go away on the right side AND LIGHT BLEED like are you serious? The box was even in the WORST condition what did I pay $420 for? a load of crap? EDIT : My SECOND monitor came in and it poses the SAME white dot on the screen like the last one, it has no light bleed but still had a dead pixel and a white spot, worst experience
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: So far it does what it says and I haven't had any problems. And price wasn't to bad either good gaming frames.
customer_reviews.author: J m

customer_reviews.title: While the scratch on the screen and the dead pixels did cause me to return it this is an excellent monitor. I did run a few games at ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordering the used model I did have the expectation of flaws with this monitor. While the scratch on the screen and the dead pixels did cause me to return it this is an excellent monitor. I did run a few games at the 240hz refresh rate and they were smooth as butter. Definitely one of the better 1080p monitors on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Stuck pixels, missing wire panel and poor screen resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Product I received was defective. Cluster of stuck pixels on the right hand side of the monitor, missing wire panel and poor screen resolution. Seeker refuses to exchange to the product. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob L.

customer_reviews.title: too expensive
customer_reviews.text: this is for my brother birthday gift.when i told him the price.he just ask me to post a review 3star.he said this is too expensive for this product.no recommend..
customer_reviews.author: QZ

customer_reviews.title: Doube
customer_reviews.text: Bad product. Why? The colors are wAshed out and there is dead pixel. Also the shipping is pathetic. Make sure they ship to you
customer_reviews.author: Thuy X.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor! If you're looking for a G-Sync gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor! If you're looking for a G-Sync gaming monitor. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: Gaming Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons gaming setup and it's now complete. One of the best monitors on the market. Looks amazing. The only issue is the spider legs are pretty long and got in the way of my sons mouse. We did set up a dual monitor stand, though, which solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: christopher spikoski

customer_reviews.title: It's literally fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor I've ever had, hands down. The only monitor I'd imagine that could top this in style and functionality is the Varanus. All jokes aside, only a 4k 240hz monitor could be better. There's no screen burn, no broken pixels, no discoloring, no flickering. Just a solid, well functioning screen.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Watts

customer_reviews.title: Wait for a sale
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for this, it's an outstanding monitor. Escape From Tarkov, Squad, and Insurgency Sandstorm all look better and smoother than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this monitor for over a year now. Despite my dislike for Alienware I have to admit they make a great monitor. It's 240hz screen makes everything buttery smooth. The price was a great value for me at the time and I would 100% buy another one if I had the extra cash.
customer_reviews.author: TMtrue

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for competitive gaming
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good monitor no complains, specifically good for competitive. It is because of this monitor that I am able to improve at a faster rate, but the differences between 144hz and 240hz is not that noticeable but there is one. The game feel more responsive and faster. Really great monitor to go competitive gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Limbo

customer_reviews.title: You have to pay for return
customer_reviews.text: Kept getting two lines on the left side of the monitor seller asked me to pay for return shipping label never again every time I downloaded something there were two lines on the left side vertically
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: No dead pixels. It's a quality piece. The bezels are sooooo much thinner than what I came from. The performance is incredible. At first I thought the color was a bit weird, but after a day of playing on it, it seems just fine. Was essentially a plug and play affair. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Taliyon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a couple months now and it has not given me a single issue, does everything it advertises. Great build quality, very nice colors even though it’s a TN panel, and of course the amazing refresh rate. Honestly surprised Alienware put out such a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhuy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: new gaming experience! went from 144 to 240. no regrets
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: The best monitor for competitive gamers.
customer_reviews.text: Once you use this monitor you don't want to change it.
customer_reviews.author: Whtyonsy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this
customer_reviews.text: 7 Months of usage and the panel is going out 7 months for a $500 monitor
customer_reviews.author: Alienware can't make quality products

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor but if defective just know shipping will come out of your pocket
customer_reviews.text: First one I ordered came defective. When it would go into power saving mode or sleep mode it would not wake up again even after disabling the setting. Returned it and had to pay for shipping. I’m still giving it 5 stars because the second monitor I got has been working great, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: excellent gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: it's an amazing gaming monitor for fps. Comparing to Asus and BenQ monitor, this product is more competitive at the price and display quality. But, if you are looking for a monitor for coding or something like that. I will recommend high resolution IPS monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fast!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that you will destroy Warzone console players before they can even get a shot in. Easy W!
customer_reviews.author: elie hang

customer_reviews.title: alienware monitor
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for Christmas who is into gaming and really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Wow Amazing. 244hz makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monitor i tried coming from someone who's been using Asus gaming monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar y

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS MONITOR! You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor, colors look amazing and quality is stunning.. I love the slim design
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best competitive FPS monitor available w/ gsync. A must purchase for hardcore online gamers
customer_reviews.author: Greg S

customer_reviews.title: One of the best 240hz monitors out there no doubt
customer_reviews.text: You’ll never go below a 240hz after this Only con is the panel that’s suppose to hide the wires in the back doesn’t fit snug, it pops back out when tried to force back in
customer_reviews.author: Destry R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, love pc gaming
customer_reviews.text: I like everything lol, 240hz is too good, I came from ps4 with only 60hz so this is a whole new world for games.
customer_reviews.author: Rv98

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor if you want the 240hz
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the monitor for 4 months now pictured good on it gives off bright colors, I know some people complain about dead pixels but mine is just fine. Also I got it during cyber Monday so I got a good 30% off!
customer_reviews.author: Jairo

customer_reviews.title: I am lovin' it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this monitor for 3 years now and it is still like brand new really amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Omer F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mornitor.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a superb mornitor for hard-core FPS gamers, although a little expensive,but after I actually used it with a few games I think it is worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Peng Shenyi

customer_reviews.title: Works great 👍 be sure to check for dead pixels on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Couple of dead pixels on arrival....apart from that everything else works great 👍.....i would give it 5 stars buh sake of the dead pixels that's why I'm giving 4
customer_reviews.author: HACKMAN OSEI

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He’s a gamer, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Major difference from 60hz to 240hz definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: looks great but i had to get a mount to make ...
customer_reviews.text: wish I had the option to save some money by not getting the stand with it; it's just too big and too heavy. looks great but i had to get a mount to make better use of my desk.
customer_reviews.author: fahad

customer_reviews.title: gamers
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend refresh rate is amazing and a must for online gaming
customer_reviews.author: chris perez

customer_reviews.title: 200+ FPS
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor, although there may be other gaming monitors that may be better. If you get this 1080p 240 fps monitor and run it on a nice rig i bet youll have a blast gaming
customer_reviews.author: Jason Randolph

customer_reviews.title: High performance, affordable gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great performance in an affordable package. A nice monitor for high performance gaming.
customer_reviews.author: HappyAstronomer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a present for my son and he absolutely loves it. He built his own computer and needed the processing to be extremely fast. It met all of his expectations
customer_reviews.author: Nichole johnson

customer_reviews.title: It’s gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite new monitor, there is no point in buying it if your computer can’t run your games at anything above 144hz, you must have a pretty powerful pc
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got my pc and my ps4pro on it at the same time and best quality and i also have a 4K tv and i enjoyed the monitor more
customer_reviews.author: VICENTE A Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great 1080p 240hz monitor. One grip no built in speakers in the monitor but it’s listed not having one so it’s fair game.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gaming Monitors
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these and they are amazing monitors
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Really good overall monitor. If u get it at 350 dollars definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice about this product
customer_reviews.text: I just wanna say im happy with my purchase. I never experienced this smooth gameplay with no screen tearing
customer_reviews.author: Erwin A.

customer_reviews.title: A good screen with some small flaws
customer_reviews.text: In general, this screen is good. There're some red points and two green points on the screen, but it does not influence too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kaimin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good product but I recommend u have a big desk
customer_reviews.text: I love the monitor but the only bad thing is it takes up so much space on my current desk
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitors
customer_reviews.text: I love these monitors. The only issue I had was one of the covers on the back was damaged when it arrived. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Maria V.

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gaming no matter what style of gameplay plus it looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but after change
customer_reviews.text: Turn response time to normal and the darkness around moving images goes away
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor.  Love gsync
customer_reviews.text: Went from a 144hz monitor and I'll never go back. Great monitor
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for a good pc
customer_reviews.text: It amazing but a little to much but everything else, makes the best monitor you cam buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monitor had graphical stutters
customer_reviews.text: My monitor had stuttering issues. I tried every combination of graphical settings known to man, as well as different graphics cards and different computers, just to make sure it was a monitor issue and not on the computer end. The colors looked good, and 240 Hz is awesome... but my 240 Hz experience was ruined by little 10 frame stutters at high FPS that would happen about once per second. I have returned it now and I can't decide if I want to repurchase the same one or not. It is a beautiful stand and it has small bezels, and I think I just got unlucky and got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Z

customer_reviews.title: Alienware monitor
customer_reviews.text: Got the product I wanted and the monitor is high quality, recommend
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable g-sync monitor
customer_reviews.text: Best g-sync monitor to play off my Alienware r3 15. I had to get a display port to mini display port 1.2 cable which was a hastle. Only taking 1 star off because it's not it's it's TN but the 240hz makes up for it
customer_reviews.author: Debra B. Gotelli

customer_reviews.title: Its a great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor honestly i have nothing else to say because it fitted my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe salas

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, good color
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, good color,good picture. However my unit came with a Dead/Stuck pixel, After contacting dell/alienware about this issue they told me it is in their policy and that they will not be giving me my warranty. So i guess i will just be forced to return it to amazon and order a new monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Risa Rudeen

customer_reviews.title: Above entry level gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Switched from a 4K 60hz to a 1080p 240hz. Hands down the 4K 60hz has better image quality but the 1080p 240hz has less input lag and screen tearing. I would recommend a 1440p 144hz for gaming enthusiasts since 4K gaming is, in my opinion, not quite perfected yet.
customer_reviews.author: GummyBears :D

customer_reviews.title: My new monitor seems to be working well and has great resolution and vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: My monitor didn't work properly -- it wouldn't wake up from sleep mode. I returned/replaced it through Amazon, but had to pay $40 in shipping costs. My comment is more about Amazon not paying shipping on a defective item than with the monitor. My new monitor seems to be working well and has great resolution and vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not disappoint, one of the best monitors I have ever use :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal right
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was kinda sketchy cause I got it for 120 us dollars. Great deal right! But it is amazing very clean and modern look. P.s I got it from a 3 party seller.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It look amazing >> the best looking monitors I’ve ever seen !

customer_reviews.title: the monitor looks good but when you are playing and you move the ...
customer_reviews.text: the monitor looks good but when you are playing and you move the panel changes and looks like a network behind all things and a bit pixelated, l try to switch my BenQ Zowie XL2430 but believe Benq make very very nice monitor for gameplay and the eye care anti flick from benq is very nice compared with the 'technologys' from Alienware..... you are just buying design brom Alienware not anyelse... l highly recommend use another brands like Benq Zowie or Acer predator not Alien

customer_reviews.title: this one was the best for my needs
customer_reviews.text: After testing out multiple monitors for gaming, this one was the best for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

product_meta.title: Alienware 25 Gaming Monitor - AW2518H NVIDIA G-Sync 240Hz Refresh 1ms response time
product_meta.description: Alienware' S new 25-inch gaming monitor packs premium gaming performance features into a captivating display. Featuring iconic Alienware design, custom AlienFX lighting, 240Hz refresh rate with 1ms response time, and NVIDIA G-SYNC technology with Ultra low motion blur technology for smooth responsive gameplay.
feature_bullets: Designed for the enthusiast, the AW2518H delivers a futuristic style and precise form with solid stability
See gaming differently with NVIDIA G-SYNC. This breakthrough Display technology eliminates screen tearing and minimizes Display stutter and input lag
Lightning-fast 240Hz Native refresh rate combined with 1ms response time delivers buttery-smooth gameplay with virtually no input lag
Specific gaming OSD (onscreen Display) design keeps your user experience in the gaming theme
Game comfortably in your zone with a height adjustable stand, tilt, swivel and pivot features

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars462 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
